channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cognos Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cognos Analytics

item.title: CVE-2021-39045|2024-09-16T16:47:36.549Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 could allow a local attacker to obtain information due to the autocomplete feature on password input fields. IBM X-Force ID: 214345.

item.title: CVE-2021-29756|2024-09-16T19:47:16.734Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (CSRF) in the My Inbox page which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 202167.

item.title: CVE-2021-38886|2024-09-16T16:23:02.930Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 209399.

item.title: CVE-2022-36773|2024-09-16T19:40:32.329Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 233571.

item.title: CVE-2019-4139|2024-09-16T16:18:10.502Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0, 11.1.0, and 11.1.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158335.

item.title: CVE-2021-29745|2024-09-16T16:58:01.641Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 is vulnerable to priviledge escalation where a lower evel user could have access to the 'New Job' page to which they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 201695.

item.title: CVE-2018-1721|2024-09-16T19:55:39.776Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 and 11.1 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or cause the web server to make HTTP requests to arbitrary domains. IBM X-Force ID: 147369.

item.title: CVE-2021-38946|2024-09-16T20:42:18.208Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 211240.

item.title: CVE-2021-38909|2024-09-16T18:28:16.876Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 209706.

item.title: CVE-2021-38903|2024-09-16T19:57:25.600Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 209691.

item.title: CVE-2018-1842|2024-09-16T17:48:44.044Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11 Configuration tool, under certain circumstances, will bypass OIDC namespace signature verification on its id_token. IBM X-Force ID: 150902.

item.title: CVE-2017-1784|2024-09-16T17:04:03.205Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 could produce results in temporary files that contain highly sensitive information that can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 136858.

item.title: CVE-2020-4377|2024-09-16T20:02:41.773Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Anaytics 11.0 and 11.1 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 179156.

item.title: CVE-2021-39047|2024-09-16T16:22:59.856Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 and IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.1, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 214349.

item.title: CVE-2021-20468|2024-09-16T16:48:06.187Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 196825.

item.title: CVE-2020-4951|2024-09-16T18:34:01.248Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 contains locally cached browser data, that could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2021-20464|2024-09-16T20:32:28.158Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics PowerPlay (IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7) could be vulnerable to an XML Bomb attack by a malicious authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 196813.

item.title: CVE-2017-1427|2024-09-16T17:44:00.652Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 127579.

item.title: CVE-2019-4366|2024-09-16T20:06:51.978Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 and 11.1 is susceptible to an information disclosure vulnerability where an attacker could gain access to cached browser data. IBM X-Force ID: 161748.

item.title: CVE-2024-25041|2024-06-28T20:07:03.127Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is potentially vulnerable to cross site scripting (XSS). A remote attacker could execute malicious commands due to improper validation of column headings in Cognos Assistant. IBM X-Force ID: 282780.

item.title: CVE-2024-25047|2024-06-04T17:35:50.331Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.title: CVE-2024-25047|2024-05-02T20:09:21.479Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.title: CVE-2024-25053|2024-06-28T18:53:48.828Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is vulnerable to improper certificate validation when using the IBM Planning Analytics Data Source Connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between IBM Planning Analytics server and IBM Cognos Analytics server. IBM X-Force ID: 283364.

item.title: CVE-2024-25041|2024-06-28T18:55:55.233Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is potentially vulnerable to cross site scripting (XSS). A remote attacker could execute malicious commands due to improper validation of column headings in Cognos Assistant. IBM X-Force ID: 282780.

item.title: CVE-2024-25053|2024-07-01T20:57:36.747Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is vulnerable to improper certificate validation when using the IBM Planning Analytics Data Source Connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between IBM Planning Analytics server and IBM Cognos Analytics server. IBM X-Force ID: 283364.
